body:
When I use cgns at Sandia for IOSS library, we have the CGNS_ENABLE_SCOPING set to on.  I don't currently see this variant in the current CGNS.

I will try to send a pull-request that sets this, but since I am currently a newbie, it may take awhile. This is here in case someone else is faster and gets to it first; or if there are some guidelines on how to do it or why not to do it.
title: CGNS -- need variant for enabling CGNS_ENABLE_SCOPING
